name: MonkeyBarrel
description:
Monkey usually just mind their own business, but even monkeys know that this pandemic has sucked and they can get out of their "comfort barrel", to go and help others in need.
monkey's only mission is to assist humans by giving them a hand and have some fun.

Simple Barrel Mode Controls
  • Classic W,A,S,D movement while you have Monkeys Left
  • If you get stuck by a bug or just want to restart a level press R to go back in time
Is being a tough pandemic to everybody and monkeys just want to help, you shouldn't let any single human alone. Monkeys can always let a hand to a human friend. Blue Monkeys give you an extra monkey to your monkey chain. Golden Monkeys are always there to help get a little bit more of distance Doesn't look secure but it cannot take us to far away, right? Mind Twisting Barrel Mode Controls

Classic W,A,S,D movement while you have Monkeys Left
